block.name: USRP2 Sink
block.make: #if not $interface() and not $mac_addr() usrp2.sink_$(type.fcn)() #elif not $mac_addr() usrp2.sink_$(type.fcn)($interface) #else usrp2.sink_$(type.fcn)($interface, $mac_addr) #end if self.$(id).set_interp($interpolation) #if $lo_offset() != float('inf') self.$(id).set_lo_offset($lo_offset) #end if self.$(id).set_center_freq($frequency) self.$(id).set_gain($gain)
block.doc:
The USRP2 sink inputs 100 Megasamples per second / interpolation.
Input amplitude should be between 0.0 and 1.0.
To use the default ethernet device, leave interface blank. \ For systems with only 1 USRP2, you may leave the mac address blank. \ For multi-USRP2 systems, specify the mac address in the form 00:50:C2:85:3x:xx.
